title: Don’t miss the OUC Grand Final

replies.body: wil the championship skins come out during the the championship competition?

They are usually released sometime in those patch cycles yes. If all goes well Ashe should be included in patch 7.18 with the other legacy skins coming back with her (we are currently towards the end of patch 7.17) so it should be reasonably soon.
They better rush me or else they are never making it to OPL
